name: Spyro: Season of Ice
description: Spyro: Season of Ice is a platform game developed by Digital Eclipse and published by Vivendi Universal Games. It was released for the Game Boy Advance in 2001 in North America and Europe and published by Konami for a Japan release in 2002. It acts as an alternate sequel to the first three games along with Spyro 2: Season of Flame and Spyro: Attack of the Rhynocs.
